name: Melting Bear
description:
A little game created for the Polar Bear game jam. It's about polar bears and climate change. Float around with a polar bear on an ice floe, while reading facts about climate change. The game has no real goal. If you wait long enough, the effects of climate change will be displayed.

To install: extract the files and launch Melting Bear.exe

Controls:

Esc: Exit.

A & D: Move Left/Right
